1.content:
Tracia looked upon the building before her with some awe. The Elven Labyrinth was huge and daunting, carved out of the very base of a mountain itself. Within it was said to be the treasures accumulated by the Trix'ar, the famous Elven Amazons who once ruled over a Mighty Empire before it eventually fell. Treasures such as the jade statue of the Orc King Glorak and the emerald of Tansor are said to lie in the Labyrinth if the legends are true. But the legends also speak of the horrible fate which awaits those who are captured, their tortured screams are said to echo throughout the mountain and beyond.

Regardless of that, Tracia was determined to risk it all and get her greatest payment yet. The entrance to the Labyrinth was wide open with no guards in sight.

What should she do?
1.title: Entrance to the Labyrinth

11.content:
There doesn't appear to be anyone guarding the place, you advise Tracia to go on through, the sooner she's in and out, the better.

Tracia darts forward, trying to get through the door as quickly as possible. Just before she reaches it however, Tracia feels a weight striking into her and she is thrown to the ground, another figure tackling Tracia to the floor. The two struggled on the ground, rolling over and try to get the upperhand when a second figure came out of the shadows and grabbed Tracia's arms, pulling them back and dragging her across the soil, forcing her on to her knees. Tracia could now see clearly, even as she was trapped in her captor's vice like grip. These were Trix'ar alright, their muscular bodies and beautiful looks confirmed that as well as their Elven features. Tracia also noticed their lack of armour, only a helmet and a small breastplate on each one, it struck her as quite odd...

"Well, well, another thief trying to get our treasures? She looks as if she'll be fun..." Came a voice from a third figure who stepped out of the shadows, much like the other two in appearance.

Tracia glowered at her captors "I am Tracia the Queen of Thieves, it would do you good to remember it long-ears!" She knew she was heading for a lot of trouble doing this, but she wasn't going to let these three think that they could get away with trying to frighten her.

The Elven guard raised an eyebrow, "The Queen of Thieves herself you say? Well, that makes it very interesting to us, we've never had a Queen as a toy..." The other two guards sniggered at this, thinking of all the delights they were going to get from Tracia...

Tracia glanced up, a little worried, what did they mean by toy? Trying to show no fear still, Tracia responded by acting as if she didn't care what the guard had just said "Toy? And what sort of games do you have in mind? Nothing too complicated I hope, I don't think your minds would be able to take the strain."

The guard merely smiled in response and put her hand over Tracia's stomach while the other two took up positions beside Tracia, grabbing an arm each and holding it firmly in place. The third guard then began to twitch her fingers, pinching the skin underneath Tracia's tunic, her long fingernails scraping right on highly sensitive spots.

Tracia's eyes bolted wide open as she felt the sensations run across her torso. They were going to tickle her? Ever since she could remember, Tracia had been hugely vulnerable to tickling, with her feet and stomach being her worst spots. If this was ledgendary torture that the Trix'ar inflicted on thieves, Tracia had a lot to worry about...

A sudden movement behind the guard tormenting Tracia caught the thief's attention, another figure was darting towards the entrance, another thief trying their luck while Tracia was the centre of attention. Tracia had to decide, should she call out for help to distract the guards and divert them to get the other thief while she escapes? Or should she remain quite and hope for the other thief to help her with a surprise attack against her tormentors?
11.title: Go in

111.content:
You quickly advise Tracia to call out for help from the stranger, it may be her only hope.

"H-Hey you! Help me out here!" Tracia calls out to the shadowed figure beside the entrance, causing everyone to look at the way you were shouting. The figure also turned towards you upon hearing the shout and you can make out that it's a rather handsome young man although his features are generally marred by the state of shock on his face right now.

Giving out a snarl of sheer fury, the Elven guard previously teasing Tracia lunged for the stranger, tackling him and knocking him down onto his back as she gained the element of surprise. The young man let out a whoosh of air before his mouth curled up and he started to break into laughter as he felt the Elven Woman's fingers dig whole heartedly into his sides, tickling without mercy. The young man cackled long and hard as he struggled to get away but to no avail. One of the Elven women holding onto Tracia grinned and let go, running up to the man and grabbing onto his feet as she prepared to attack them.

With the two Elven guards distracted, only one is left holding onto Tracia, providing a much needed opportunity to either escape or help the young man.

What will you advise Tracia to do?
111.title: Call out for help

1111.content:
You advise Tracia to escape, your cover's blown, no point in sticking round for anything right now.

Elbowing her captor in the stomach, Tracia uses the moment to escape, pulling away and starting to run as fast as she can from the scene, very much relieved and more than a little puzzled as she didn't hear the cry of the other guards to follow her in a chase. When she reached the edge of the forest from which she had emerged earlier, Tracia risked a backward glance before stopping as she realised why she wasn't being chased.

The young man who had been tackled to the ground was now the attention of all three guards, the obvious temptation to go after him as being greater than chasing after Tracia. Looking on at the scene, Tracia gave a shudder of horror at the thought of being tormented like the young man was right now. His boots had been torn off with one woman sitting on his ankles and raking her fingers up and down the exposed soles, grinning evilly while doing so. The guard who had first tackled him was tickling up and down his exposed ribs as she trapped his arms beneath her legs, the tickling causing the man to scream from the torment. But the worst was from the third Elven guard at his hips as she unbuckled his trousers, pulling them down while tickling his hips with glee. When the man's penis was exposed, the guard ran one of her long fingernails right up it...

The resulting shriek of tortured laughter was enough to bring Tracia out of her stupor and she turned to flee out of her situation. The screaming laughter following her for quite some time...

Your advice has led to Tracia without the treasure, but at least she got away without falling into the clutches of the Elven guards. If you want to try your luck further, go back and try again.
1111.title: Escape

1112.content:
You advise Tracia to help out the stranger, he might be a big help in getting the treasure after all.

Delivering an elbow to her captor's stomach, Tracia throws her to the ground before rushing over to the other two guards who're busy with the young man. Tracia' grabbed at the one at his feet, pulling her off and trying to throw her out the way, not noticing the guard reaching into a pouch on her belt and pulling some powder from it before throwing the substance into Tracia's face. Almost in an instant, the thief started to become drowsy and she started to drop to the ground, asleep before she even reached it.

**************************************************************************** ******************************************************************************** ******************

After some time, Tracia wakes up, stirring from her deep slumber and groggily raising her head, the sound of insane laughter echoing through her skull. With her mind clearing, Tracia realises the laughter is a man's and is coming from right next to her. Turning her head, she saw the young man from earlier, completely stripped naked and chained to the wall with in-built manacles on the right side of the entrance. Two of the Elven guards were delighting in tickling him as well as sexually teasing him as well. As one guard tickled the man's armpits with his fingers digging in deep into the pits, burrowing hard, her tongue lapped at his chest licking nice and long with little flicks across his nipples for extra sensation. Added to this is the second guard who took interest in the man's thighs, flicking her fingers up and down across the insides of them while teasing his erect manhood with little soft breaths, causing it to quiver. The man's face was contorted with laughter, his face screwed up and bright red as tears streamed down his cheeks, babbling madly as he tried to beg for mercy through his laughing, to little effect.

It took a poke in her belly to bring Tracia down to Earth as she brought her gaze forward to the third guard who had dropped her helmet and was exposing a fine head of raven hair that fell down to her hips "Now that I've got your attention." She said evilly while stroking Tracia's bare belly, an action that brought the fact that Tracia was naked to her attention as the thief blushed deeply whilst tittering at the soft touch "For trespassing in the Labyrinth, you and that handsome man of your will be punished for a long, long time. And for your little transgression earlier, we'll start it off."

Tracia could only burst out laughing as the tickling over her bare stomach began, struggling desperately to escape from her manacles as the long fingernails of the guard scratched lightly below her navel to no avail. Both Tracia and her new companion were to be guests of the Labyrinth for quite some time...

You advised Tracie unwisely, go back and try again.
1112.title: Help out the man

112.content:
You advise Tracia to remain silent for now. The other person is bound to help her and you wouldn't want them to lose the element of surprise.

Tracia remains silent (At least, as much as she can as her belly is softly tickled) as the figure gets closer and closer to them... before darting into the doorway and into the Labyrinth. The sheer shock of this is enough to break her walls of resistance and she instantly begins to shriek with laughter, too surprised to even shout out to the figure as the tickling became harder. Her stomach was the main target as the Elven guard mercilessly attacked her belly, running her fingernails across the area. Tracia bucked and shrieked at the tickling, unable to control of herself as the fingers poked, prodded and scratched her sensitive stomach.

Tracia positively howled with laughter as the tickling continued before it suddenly stopped. Tracia breathed deeply before looking up at her tormentors "She'll do great." The one who had been tickling her said "Take her to my quarters. I want a little bit of fun before she's sent elsewhere." The guard leaned down right down and smiled like a wolf "And if you so muh as make a peep on the way there, you'll definetly regret it..." Tracia was pulled to her feet and was dragged along to her tickly fate, cursing the person who had refused to help her...

You advised Tracia wrongly. Go back and try again.
112.title: Remain silent

12.content:
Even if there are no guards right now, it is best just to wait that extra amount of time in case a patrol suddenly appears. Tracia agrees with the desicion and waits a moment to see if there are any dangers. It isn't long before something does indeed happen, a figure suddenly bursts fom the shadows to the right, another thief it seems. This one, unlike Tracia, is male. He wears no mask and looks to be quite young, just barely an adult and is rather handome with a dashing face and hair tied back in a ponytail. Tracia eyes him with a keen eye as his well muscled body runs to the entrance of the Labyrinth while also realising that he could be a blessing in a disguise.

This belief rings true when the thief reaches the entrance to the Labyrinth only for a voice to shout "HALT!" Before he reaches the door. The thief stops and twists around, looking for the source of the voice "Put you hands up and stay where you are!" Came the strong voice again. Two figures stepped from from the shadows near the entrance of the Labyrinth, they were two female Elven Archers. Tracia looked at the two with interest, these were the legendary Trix'ar? They certainly lived up to the rumours, both were over a foot taller than the average man, were beautiful (As all Elves are) and were very well armed, carrying a crossbow with a quiver full of arrows with a sword and several daggers. Curiously enough, their armour only really consisted of a helmet and small breastplates which left their midriffs bare.

"Well what do we have here?" One of the warriors asked as she walked around the thief until she was right behind him "A lost little boy perhaps?" Her mocking tone of voice helped the thief overcome his fear for the moment.

"I'm no boy!" He shouted "I'm twenty years of age and my name is Celan!"

Neither of the guards looked impressed and the one in front of him laughed "Oh you are precious aren't you? Hey Leoner," She called out to the other Elven guard "Since there's just the three of us, why don't we have a little fun with our guest? You know, show him what's in store for him."

Leoner gave a sadistic grin, the affect on her beatiful features was enough to make Tracia flinch in horror "Why Salier," She said "I do believe that that's a magnificent idea." With that, Leoner dropped her crossbow and then drove her hands deep in Celan's armpits.

It took a second before Celan realised what was happening and reacted accordingly "NO NOT THAAAHAHAHAHAHAAA!!!!!" He roared as the ticklish sensations got a hold of him, causing his knees to buckle and he fell to the ground. Leoner followed him, still tickling his armpits hard enough to prevent Celan from fightin back. Salier also dropped her crossbow and dove at Celan, grabbing his boots and tearing them off. The young thief was helpless as Sailer stripped his feet completely, leaving his feet vulnerable to be tickled sadisticaly "NOTTHEFEEEEHAAHHAHAHAAAAA!!!" Celan screamed as Salier began to rake her fingernails up and down his soles.

Tracia looked on in confusion, tickling? Was that it? The horrible torture that people were subjected too? Well regardless of that, should Tracia aid Celan and attack the two guards or wait until they take him into the Labyrinth and enter safely?
12.title: Wait a moment

121.content:
You advise Tracia to aid Celan, after all, he might come in useful at some point in the future. Tracia agrees and begins to creep up on Celan and his tormentors. By now, Leoner had stripped the young man of his tunic, leaving him naked from the waist up and vulnerable to Leoner as she tickled his bare ribs with one hand and used the other to tickle his bellybutton by putting a finger in and wriggling it hard.Tracia couldn't help but notice Celan's rather well muscled abs, he was quite well built for his age. Sailen was still at his feet, holding them under her arm and tickling his soles madly. Celan was laughing hysterically, his handsome face contorted with with laughter as his tormentors showed no signs of stopping.

Tracia gradually sneaked up of the two Elves and was about to launch into action when a movement out the corner of her eye distracted her. Tracia turned and saw another guard facing her, this one had some odd coloured powder in her hands. Before Tracia could react, the guard flung the powder in her face, causing the magic within it to make Tracia fall to the ground and into a deep sleep...

**************************************************************************** ****************************

Tracia woke up to the sound of hysterical laughter that was overpowering in its sheer noise levels. The thief groggily opened her eyes and gasped in shock at what she saw. A huge cavernous room lay before her, the roof of it was almost out of sight such was the rooms height. Tracia then noticed what lined the walls of the cavern, hundreds upon hundreds of people, completely naked, bound by shackles and all were screaming with laughter. A sudden shrill laugh to her right made Tracia made look and gape at the sight of Celan, stripped naked and bound to the wall being tickled wildly by six long, stiff and scarlet coloured feathers. Two were at his armpits, twirling quickly at the very centre of them. Another two were slowly brushing up and down the soles of his feet, occasionally stopping to flick his toes in a cruel manner. But the worst torture was reserved for his penis and balls as one feather slowly dragged up and up and down his shaft as the other tickled his balls through quickly brushing its tip against them. Celan was moaning and shrieking with laughter at the same time, his sexual energies mixing with the torture of the tickling.

"Wonderful isn't it?" Said a surprisingly clear voice in front of Tracia. The thief turned and was greeted by the sight of a beautiful Elven woman, tall with noble features and golden hair "This is the fate of all those who try to steal from us, bewitched feathers tormenting them into laughter and a sexual frenzy." The Elven woman held up six feathers much the same as the ones tickling Celan. They glowed for a moment and then began to float towards Tracia "Don't bother trying to resist," The woman said "You'll be here for a long time..." As the feathers descended and began to tickle Tracia's naked body, the truth of the woman's words hit her and all she could do was laugh...

You guided Tracia unwisely. Her quest ends with her on the wrong end of a feather. Try again.
121.title: Attack the guards

122.content:
You advise Tracia to wait, one of the guards had mentioned there being three of them and with only two visible at this time, caution would be best. But at least Tracia won't be bored...

By now, Celan had been stripped of his upper tunic and his nicely toned upper body was under attack still. Leoner had moved from the young thief's underarms to his belly, using both hands to dig in and tickle with wild abandon. Salier had trapped Celan's feet by sitting on his ankles and was now using one hand to pull back the toes of his right foot and tickling the bottom of them with her other hand. Celan was in ticklish agony, with both his belly and feet under attack, he was powerless to even move, the tickling sapping his strength to even put up a physical resistance.

After several minutes of ticklish torment, Celan collapsed into silent laughter, all of his energy drained from his body. Leoner and Salier mercifully stopped tormenting him and stood up "Well that was fun." Leoner commented before turning to face the shadows and shouting "Hey Jaye! Give us a hand taking him to the Cavern!" A third Elven guard stepped out from the shadows near the entrance of the entrance to the Labyrinth, her beautiful face scowling.

"Glad to see you two had your fun." Jaye muttered bitterly. She walked over to where Celan was lying and bent down "Well you won't be needing these anymore." She said, indicating his trousers. With those words, she bent down and ripped them from Celan's lower body before giving the thief an admiring look "Well, you are a man aren't you?" Jaye said, indicating Celan's well endowned manhood. The Elven woman reached down and gave Celan's package a quick tickle, causing the young man to give a scream of laughter, it was obviously a very sensitive spot.

Jaye stood up, an evil smile upon her face "As I was just going off duty anyway, could you two help me take him to my quarters? I'll send him to the Cavern... eventually." Both Leonr and Salier grinned at this and grabbed Celan, picking him up and carrying him into the Labyrinth, Jaye following behind.

With the entrance now open, Tracia enters the Labyrinth and begins her hunt...
122.title: Wait until they're finished

1221.content:
The Labyrinth's appearance was quite unexpected. The corridors were well lit and straight, with little cover. Tracia crept carefully, if she was discovered by a guard, she'd be in major trouble. Tracia also noticed the decorations on the walls were of an... interesting design. Both men and women apparently being tickled by their Elven captors were carved deep into the walls and served a warning to those who had made it those far.

After a few minutes, Tracia made it to a fork in the corridor. One heading to the left, another to the right and a final corridor heading straight ahead. Which one will you advise Tracia to take?
1221.title: Into the Labyrinth

12211.content:
The way left takes some time before actually reaching anywhere. After several minutes of creeping, Tracia finally reached the end of the corridor with two doors, one on either side. Both are open enough to leave a tiny crack to peek through each one and sounds as if both rooms have people inside them.

What will you advise Tracia to do?
12211.title: Go left

122111.content:
A pair of voices were heard from behind the door as Tracia leaned and peeked through the crack.

"... glad to be off shift. Now I can have a little fun." Tracia recognised the voice as belonging to the guard Leoner.

"You mean visit the Cavern? I'd rather wait until Jaye's finished with that cute little thief. I wouldn't mind having some fun with him myself." Came the voice of Salier.

Leoner giggled "Yeah he was cute and I want some of him too but I can't be bothered to wait until Jaye's finished with him, she always hogs the prisoners."

"Yeah, his balls will be bright blue by the time she's done with him!" Salier said with a laugh, she passed by the door and the light from her armour shined in Tracia's eyes, causing the thief to gasp a little.

Salier paused in front of the door and yawned ""Besides, I'm a little tired. I'd rather stay in tonight and..." Salier suddenly twisted around, threw open the door and grabbed Tracia before she could move "Got you!" Salier cried in triumph.
122111.title: Look into the left room

1221111.content:
Tracia gave a squeal as she tumbled to the floor as Salier dragged her into the room. Before she could even react, the warrior had grabbed her hands and held them down into the ground firmly with a vice like grip. Leoner dived down and straddled Tracia's hips while using her legs to trap Tracia's legs "Well what do we have here?" Salier cried out "Another thief who's after our treasures I'll bet! Show her what we do to tickly little thieves Leoner!"

The other Elven warrior gladly obliged and lifted Tracia's tunic, showing her flat stomach which looked very inviting to any tickling fingers. Leoner wiggled her fingers to heighten the tension before plunging them into Tracia's belly, making the thief squeal with laughter. Leoner's fingers practically danced over the soft skin, dragging and flicking all around, from her lower ribs to hips. The torture reached its high point when Leoner took a single finger and poked it into Leoner's bellybutton, a central point of ticklish nerves of the thief. Unable to bear it, Tracia began to beg for mercy through her laughter "NNNHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAMERRRRHERCEEEEEE!!!!! PLEEEEHEHAHAHAHASSSSEEEE!!!!!"

Salier actually laughed at this "Mercy?" She asked mockingly "You won't be getting any of the for a long time! From this point on, you're just out little tickle toy, get used to it!"

You have advised Tracia wrongly. Go back and try again.
1221111.title: This is not good

choices: Use the sleep powder to knock him out
122112.content:
Tracia leans over to the right room, glancing into it through the crack before her mouth gives a grin at the sight inside the place. In the room lies both Jaye and Celan on a huge, luxurious bed, both of them naked and Celan's wrists and ankles tied with rope. Jaue, the beautiful Elven woman was lying just beside him, her arm draped over his chest as she lay there sleeping. Apparently after having some fun with the young thief, she decided to leave him hanging while she had a quick nap. Just looking at the young man confirmed what Jaye had done to Celan, his body was red and gleaming with sweat while his manhood was fully erect, apparently Jaye had taken particular pleasure in assaulting that area.

Tracia steps through the door, making sure she closes it slightly to avoid any peering eyes before looking over to Celan whose eyes brimmed with hope upon seeing Tracia. Whispering so he doesn't wake up Jaye, he called out to her "Hey! Release me please! She's been tickling me to death, I can't stand it!"

Waiting to see if Jaye would wake up at that (And very thankful when she didn't) Tracia smirked at Celan's position before whispering back "And why should I? Letting you go will probably wake her up. At least give me something I can use to sweeten the deal."

Groaning and writhing in his bonds, Celan eventually gave up and nodded his head over towards a table at the back of the room where a bejewlled glove sat along with a small leather pouch "Over there, there's a glove that you need to wear in order to get past some of the doors here and a bag of that sleeping powder they use, just blow it into someone's face and it works! Can you please let me go!?"

Walking over to the table, Tracia picked up and pocketed both items before turning back to Celan, his expression silently begging.

What will you advise Tracia to do?
122112.title: Look into the right room

1221121.content:
You advise Tracia to help Celan escape, he could be of great help at some point in the future.

Motioning him to be quiet, Tracia leaned over Celan, her long hair brushing over his stomach causing him to squeak with a small laugh. A glare from Tracia silenced him once more before she began work untying his wrists. She scowled in concentration as the knots keeping Celan's wrists tied to the bed were good and tight and she made no progress on freeing him. So caught up in her task was Tracia that she didn't notice the weight on her belt get lighter, nor the movement of Jaye until Celan called out "Look out!"

Turning her face to look at Jaye, Tracia was too late to avoid the sleep powder thrown into her face. There wasn't even time to think before sleep overcame her and she collapsed on top of Celan in a deep slumber.

**************************************************************************** ******************************************************************************** ******************

When she awoke, Tracia took a moment to gather her thoughts before realising what state she was in, tied up and naked right next to Celan. Their positions were still on the bed but now with their wrists tied together on one end of the bed and their ankles the other, forming a line. Tracia couldn't help that notice Celan was eyeing her up a fair bit, blushing at seeing her naked body tied close to his. A voice pulled Tracia from her thoughts however and turned to see Jaye, still naked, standing at the foot of the bed with the mosr wicked of grins "Ah good, now that you're awake, we can begin. You two will eventually go to the Cavern for your punishment. But for now, you're both mine."

With those words ended, Jaye brought down her hands with the long, sharp fingernails and started tickling the feet of both Tracia and Celan. The nails glided up and down across the bare skin of both pairs of feet, teasing only at first before Jaye's fingers got faster and faster, scratching from the heels to the toes with quick, merciless motions. As both Celan and Tracia started screaming with laughter and thrashing in their bonds, Tracia knew that this was only the beginning, the maddening tickles on their feet was merely a preview of what was to come.

You have advised Tracia unwisely, go back and try again.
1221121.title: Help Celan escape

1221122.content:
You advise Tracia to use the sleep powder on Celan, no point in risking waking up Jaye and bringing the Labyrinth down on her.

With a swift movement, Tracia reached into her pouch and pulled out some powder before throwing it into Celan's face. Unable to even protest before it took effect, Celan instantly went into a deep sleep. Taking a quick look over to Jaye confirmed she was still sleeping and so Tracia quickly left with the glove and sleep powder in tow. Retracing her steps, Tracia moves away from the sleeping quarters of the guards and went for the split in the corridor from earlier. Reaching it, she heads left to look for entrance to the treasure room of the Labyrinth and comes across a door with a palm imprint on it. Rembering Celan's words, Tracia placed the glove on her hand before resting her hand in the imprint.

With a whirring sound, the door slowly opened leading to another corridor stretching out in front of her. Looking round to make sure she wasn't being followed, Tracia stepped through the doors and headed down the corridor, the doors slowly closing behind her.
1221122.title: Use the sleep powder to knock him out

choices: Tickle one of the guards as a distraction
12211221.content:
The hallway was dark as Tracia walked through it, hugging to the walk closely as she tried to avoid being seen. After some time, voice could be heard around a corner. Tracia snuck her head round the edge of the corner to see two Elven guards standing at a link to another corridor, facing away from Tracia further into the Labyrinth as they spoke.

"... Tried to break in but was caught by Jaye and the rest." The guard on the left said, her voice sounding disappointed as she flicked some of her black hair idly.

Her partner tutted in exasperation "You're insatiable you know that? You spend all your time in the Caverns tormenting thieves, is your libido all you ever think with?"

The first guard giggled and nodded, her laugh having a harmonic ring to it "You bet. Maybe if you let yourself go once in a while, you'd see why. All those people, tied up, tickled and horny, it's impossible to resist!" Tracia noticed that the guard idly brought her hand down to her thigh, evidently even talking about this causing her to gain quite an itch.

The two guards seem to be able to stay for quite some time. Should Tracia wait them out or create some kind of distraction?
12211221.title: Further into the Labyrinth

122112211.content:
You advise Tracia to wait it out and hope for something to turn up.

Some time passed with Tracia growing more bored by the second from the chatter between the two guards, having drifted from the treatment of prisoners to idle gossip of the the guards round the Labyrinth, something Tracia could not get into at all. She slowly began to zone out, her mind turning to wonder what sort of treasures the Labyrinth held and hoping that they'd be worth it. So caught up in her imaginings was she that Tracia didn't hear the footsteps behind her until it was too late. With little warning, Tracia felt fingers dig right into her sides with viscous squeezes, causing her to leap up and squeal with laughter from the sudden attack.

The noise instantly gained the guard's attention and the two looked back to see Tracia dancing about and laughing madly while another guard was tickling her sides fiendishly, not letting go despite her victim's struggles. Tracia could do little more than cackle at the tickling, her face contorted into a big smile as the guard's fingers dug in deep at her flanks, not leaving her alone for an instant as she tickled long and hard on the flanks. The tickling only stopped when Tracia lost her balance and fell to the ground, contact breaking as she hit the floor.

Taking a moment to recover, Tracia breathed hard before trying to get back up, only to be stopped by three pairs of hands that pushed her back down to the ground, preventing her from moving completely "Well, well, well." Came a voice that Tracia recognised as being the guard with blonde hair "An intruder all the way in here? You've done well to get this far at least but no more."

"That's right." Came another voice "It's off to the Caverns with you."

"Aww..." Said the first guard, her voice choked with disappointment "Can't we have her stick around for just a little while? I'm sure she'll be lots of fun..." Tracia felt a hand trace up the back of her thigh, tickling the inside of it with slow, gentle scratches that nevertheless caused the thief to squirm in her captor's hands.

Another hand suddenly poked into Tracia's ribs, causing her to outright laugh from the sudden attack and teasing on her thigh. The second guard spoke again, her voice laden with temptation "Well... I suppose we can keep her for a little while at least..." A hand snuck up Tracia's tunic, brushing against her bare back while starting to rip away her clothing.

A sudden tug ripped off Tracia's tunic as a whoop came from the blonde guard, overjoyed at getting a new toy. Barely able to defend herself, Tracia was stripped of all her clothes completely, the torn rags being flung into the dark corner of the corridor along with her boots. Flipped onto her back, Tracia was held down at her arms and legs while the blonde guard straddled her hips, throwing her helmet aside to look right at Tracia, showing off her long flowing hair and own features that matched Tracia's for beauty. Giggling with joy, the guard grinned down at Tracia like a cat that just caught a mouse "Ooh, this is going to be so much fun! Especially for us." She said evilly as her fingers began to tickle along Tracia's lower belly, just above her hips. The fingers scraped just from below the thief's navel down to her mound, emitting both shrieks and some moans from Tracia.

122112211.title: Wait it out

122112212.content:
With time of the essence to get through the Labyrinth, you advise Tracia to take drastic measures. Slowly sneaking up as the guard's conversation wound down, she took her chance when they had turned around to face either end of the corridor. Tracia reached out and tickled the buttocks of the black haired guard, their breastplates and short skirts offering little protection against the sudden attack. Grinning, she reached over and tickled her buttocks, earning a burst of laughter.

"Going to deny it? Good, it'll just make it all the more fun to get you to admit it. Let's take you someplace where we can really get you talking..." With that, the raven haired guard dragged her partner away down the right corridor, continuing to tickle her to weaken the resistance. Tracia waits until the laughter dies off into the distance and the coast is clear. There are two corridors to follow, one down to the left or one to the right where the guards had gone to. Which one should she choose?
122112212.title: Tickle one of the guards as a distraction

1221122121.content:
Tracia decides that following the guards to their "play room" might mean finding more guards. Instead, she opts to take the path to the left. The path begins to curve slightly, and she hugs the wall as she walks to try and conceal herself more.

It's not long until she's out of sight of the fork in the road, but unfortunately a new obstacle stands in her way. There is a large pit in the ground. It stretches about six feet across, but there may be hope yet, for hanging from the ceiling is a long rope which stops right about your ground level. It looks rather worn and thin, but Tracia is sure that her weight isn't a concern.

She inches closer to the pit and peers in. There is not enough light to see, and it ebbs into pure darkness after ten or so feet down. She isn't sure how deep the pit is.

Taking a few steps back, Tracia examines her two choices. She might be able to leap across the pit, or she can play it safe and swing on the rope.
1221122121.title: Go left

12211221211.content:
The rope looked a little unstable for Tracia's eyes. After all, Tracia was physically fit and had made similar leaps before, she was sure she could make it. Taking a few steps back, she braced herself and gave a running leap over the pit. Mid-air, something odd seemed to happen as the Pit seemed to grow and extend, making Tracia fall short, her body hitting the edge of the pit. Desperately, her hands clawed a the floor, just about managing to hold onto the flagstones as she got a firm grip on them.

Breathing out in relief, Tracia began to pull herself out when she felt a tug on her boot. She gasped and tried desperately to pull herself out but whatever had a grip on her was holding tight. After a few seconds, it began to pull hard on her leg and she started to lose her grip, the strength in her arms leaving her as she lost her grip and tumbled into the pit.

Tracia didn't fall for long, her body soon being caught by a group of what felt to be like tentacles as they wrapped around her quickly, stretching out her limbs as she was pulled further down into the pit. Before she could cry out any protest, she felt more tentacles diving at her body and beginning to tickle her, wriggling their thin and warm appendages over her torso.

Before long, Tracia was screaming with laughter, the tentacles going inside her clothes as they tickled her bare skin, making her squeal even louder as her clothing was torn apaprt and her naked flesh left easy targets for the tickling tentacles. Through her bleary eyes, Tracia looked up to see the light from the top of the pit was nearly a dot now and realised it would be a long time before she'd see it again...
12211221211.title: Leap across

12211221212.content:
Tracia was sure she could simply leap across the pit, but if she made one mistake then it would have been her last. Instead, she opted to risk the fraying rope.

She silently counted off to herself before rushing forward and leaping for the rope. Her hands tightened around it, sending her swinging across... but then began sliding down. It was too thin to get a firm grip!

Desperately, she clenched tight enough that her nails were digging into her own palms, slowing her descent. As soon as her momentum sent her swinging over to the other side, she released, and hit the ground, causing her to roll a few times before ending up on her back.

The rope drifted gently back into position, awaiting the next person to use it.

Tracia sprawled out, panting, her adrenaline running from the close call. She wasn't sure how much more she could take. The supposed treasure had better be worth it!

Regaining her footing, she continued on through the passage, which sloped downwards before coming to another fork in the road. Directly in front of her was a hole in the ceiling, and a hole in the ground. There was a long ladder extending from both, giving her the option to head upwards or downwards upon it.

There seems to be light coming from both holes, but she couldn't see what she would be climbing into for either way.

She folded her arms over his chest, pondering, and eventually made a decision.
12211221212.title: Swing across

122112212122.content:
Tracia decided that that going deeper into the Labyrinth was likely to taker closer to the treasure. Even if the treasure could be hidden higher up inside the mountain, it didn't seem likely. With that, she began lowering herself down the ladder, looking downward as carefully as she could for elves or traps. As she kept descending, she noticed the source of the light: a single lamp embedded into the rock face next to the ladder. Looking below, she saw only darkness. Sighing, she kept going, hoping to find another light source further ahead.

As Tracia kept climbing down, the light became dim, starting to become too dark for her to see. "Where does this ladder go?" she thought "that I'm plunged into darkness, traveling hundreds of feet down without a single room? Is this the route to the treasure, or some forgotten passage? Either way, there shouldn't be any elves down in this dark." With that realization, Tracia relaxed a bit, concentrating on climbing quickly down to where she was going.

Suddenly, she realized that the ladder was tilting! It clung to the wall as it reclined at an angle. Slowly at first, but it kept curling until the ladder became hand holds, her legs dangling below her. She swung her legs out to try and find a foot hold, but with no success. As she dangled there, she realized she had two options:

First, she could keep pressing forward. She could climb hand over hand, dangling from the ladder. It would be the safest move for now, but she knew she could only go so long before her hands got tired. Even if she did eventually reach a room, her arms would be tired and she might not be able to put up a fight if there were guards. There was no way of knowing how much farther she would have to climb through the dark passageway, or if anything was lurking in the darkness.

Second, she could let go of the ladder and drop down into the darkness below. She had no idea how deep the drop was, or if there was anything soft at the bottom. Strangely enough, she could smell some moss and vegetation in the musty air around her. There might be plant life at the bottom to soften her fall. It was also a risky move, but who would put such a perilous ladder here? Would they really put it over a lethal fall? It was a risky move, but it might leave her better off.

Knowing she had to move quickly, Tracia decided.
122112212122.title: Climb downwards

1221122121222.content:
A few seconds later, Tracia hit the ground with an "Oomph!" Good thing it was sand.

Looking around, she saw only more darkness. Letting go may have given her more energy for an encounter, but that was useless if she couldn't see. She crouched and felt around in the sand, hoping to find something. She was lucky.

Her fingers hit something, and after some digging brought up a curious stone that emitted a dull glow. No rock should've been able to do that, but sure enough Tracia could now see around a bit. Dismissing it as an Elven enchantment.

An inspection of Tracia's surroundings revealed a wall of rock a few meters to her left. It ran straight along a path parallel to the ladder above, meaning that it would likely end up where the ladder did, only lower. In the stone was a carved panel, with something that looked like a handprint alongside an inscription. Both hinted that the rocky panel was actually a door.

Tracia stepped closer. The panel was roughly the shape of a door, if a bit larger. To the right, the handprint sat there invitingly and below that the inscription. Staring at it, Tracia read 'Store Room 1 - Teltus'.

Immediately two choices popped into Tracia's head. Either open the door and take look around or follow the wall to where the ladder would go. On one hand, the store room might provide Tracia with some valuable equipment. On the other, it might be a trap. In the end, Tracia decides to...

choices: Play it safe and leave the Teltus alone
Take off her vest and put on the Teltus

But at the end of the row was a breastplate kept to itself in an open casing. As Tracia got closer, she noticed it seemed to shine almost with a light of its own. Maybe it made the wearer harder to detect? Tracia looked up and noticed above the breastplate the word "Teltus" again inscribed. Apparently this was the special Teltus this storeroom was for. This garment may indeed be worth stealing.

Not wanting to carry it, Tracia would have to replace her own garment with the Teltus breastplate. It may give her better abilities, yet it would still leave her more vulnerable than before. The Teltus was also made in the skimpy elven style. And there was no telling how much it was worth. Then again, there was still the possibility of elven trickery. Looking around again to make sure she hadn't been found, Tracia decides to...

12212.content:
Tracia moved down the corridor, her eyes darting back and forth to see if any Elven guards were approaching. Suddenly, two mettalic rings came loose from the wall and sprung at Tracia's wrists, trapping them and forcing Tracia to hold her hands above her head. While she struggled, the second part of the trap was sprung as two feathers came out from hidden compartments in the wall and floated right in front of Tracia's body, some sort of magic empowering them to strike at her.

Tracia gasped in horror when she saw what was in front of her "NO! NOT THAT! NOT THAT!!!" She screamed to no avail. The feathers darted to her neck and started to go into her tunic, tickling her neck and shoulders as they went. Tracia squealed with laughter and began to thrash uncontrolably as the feathers wriggled downwards. Tracia believed that her armpits were now in deep peril but was incredibly wrong. The feathers were instead heading to her breasts. When Tracia realised this, she screamed in horror and struggled even harder but it was for nothing.

What should she do?
12213.title: Go straight ahead

122131.content:

Tracia reacted by pulling her hand, but it was stuck fast and nothing would cause it to budge. Before she could react any further, a voice from behind said "Well, well, well. It seems as if we've caught a thief." Going by your advice, Tracia puts her back to the wall and slowly slides against it to where the crossroads is, hugging against the stone tightly to avoid anyone seeing her. 1221322.title: Sneak up to the fork in the corridor.

12213221.content:
You advise Tracia to sneak past the guard to avoid any hints of detection.

With extra care, Tracia slips past the dozing guard and through to the corridor. As all she can hear is the guard dozing, Tracia thinks for a moment that she's home free, only to feel her foot go down several inches as she treads on a trick stone in the floor. Before she can even react, the trap is sprung and Tracia's leg falls through the trick stone before the hole closes up round her leg, trapping her good. The Elven guard had evidently been awoken by the noise from the trap and was now walking round Tracia, smiling in a most evil manner, taking off her helmet and letting her brunette hair fall down to her lower back as she sat down at the same height as Tracia. She barely even heard the guard speak "I get so bored with guard duty at times, I do enjoy it when a thief tries to break in, really breaks up the monotony of the job. Especially is they're cute like you."

Blushing ever so slightly at the compliment, Tracia suddenly felt a lightning shock go up her flanks, causing her to burst out laughing from the sudden tickling on her sides. 12213222.content:

You're going to guide me through the Labyrinth and to its treasure if you know what's good for you."

Evidently, the guard didn't know what was good for her as defiance blazed in her eyes and she started to struggle mightily to escape. Needing to get the advantage somehow, Tracia plunged her hand upwards, raking her nails across the guard's exposed belly as she started to tickle her. he guard's eyes opened wide before screwing up and she burst into laughter, muffled by the hand at her mouth. J-Just don't tickle my bellybutton again please..."

"Very well then Merion, lead the way to the treasures of the Labyrinth. But betray me and I won't be so merciful. Your cute little bellybutton will be mine." Tracia threatened, her fingers twitching towards Merion.

Her face etched in horror, Merion nodded once more in hasty agreement, her wish to avoid being tickled overriding all "Follow me then. And take care to step where I step." 1221322212.title: Deal with the elf woman behind you.

info.brief_description: The prizes of the Elven Labyrinth would satisfy anyone, but they are not without risks....
info.description:
She is Tracia, the infamous Queen of Thieves. Cunning, intelligent and beautiful, word of the incredible treasures of the Elven Labyrinth has reached her ears. But she better beware! Many have gone before you to steal these treasures and none have returned, their tortured screams (Said to sound like laughter?) said to sail through the many corridors of the Labyrinth. Luckily, she has you to help her to make the right choices on this quest. But keep in mind that if you make Tracia make the wrong choice, she may never be heard of again...

RULES:

Only F/F, FM, M/F tickling within
Keep all characters above the age of eighteen
No single sentence chapters
Have fun!
